title: Sinister Immortal Path
description:
Description :
        Zhang Yuan ascended to immortality, only to find himself in a bizarre world. Terrifying celestial beings ruled the heavens, while mortals below were mere livestock. The realm was filled with perilous , and the cultivators who survived were barely human. Could this world possibly have a future? Zhang Yuan didn't care. All he wanted was to ascend again and return to the immortal realm. But... could he truly go back?
